page.title: 08Occupations
page.content: There are a large number of small farms which the farming families run vurtually by themselves with very little outside help. There are also a number of smallholders who hire themselves out to the farms when extra help is needed through sickness or holiday absence. The farmers have been progressively digging up the hedgerows and making their fields bigger in order to use the bigger machinery, there is not really a great deal of arable farming except in the south of the area where the small valleys are widening. here the crops are gathered in quickly because the machinery is usually on hire and there is extra work for the casuals. In recent times the area has been attracting people who don't need to be based in a large town ie sales representatives whose area is the south west counties.
